topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54399c11636872345cfc0100#post_54399c11636872345cfc0100
Flandre can instantly obliterate things with a mere thought.
Yuyuko can invoke instant death.
Remilia can control the fate of an individual.
Keine can rewrite history.
Yukari can send them out of dimension.
Mokou and Kaguya are completely immortal and indestructible.

Considering that Godai is one of the kindest men in fiction, Yeah.


"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54399cff6368727e16ae0000#post_54399cff6368727e16ae0000
[spoiler]Vanilla ultimate form is more powerful than each of his previous forms, He can summon the weapons of the other forms, He has pyrokinesis, And his rider kick is capable of destroying the world.

Rising Ultimate is that but better.

Now he probably woudn't be able to defeat those you mentioned, But It's not like It's completely hopeless.[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54399d686368722d278d0100#post_54399d686368722d278d0100
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54399d206368726421c30000#post_54399d206368726421c30000
Even the Ponies of FiM aren't this hospitable towards their foe.[/bq]
Imagine if Fourze's crew met Touhou. . Wait scratch that imagine Gentaro meeting Yuugi. $100 on them having a epic fight then five minutes later everyone having a banquet together.  Kengo is a lot like Reimu in that neither of them would for the longest time willingly admit to being friends with the other characters until they understood the other characters and learned the power of friendship.
